document_data.mainbody:
hmrathedar the Thoughtful was a bronze dragon who lived in Waterdeep circa the Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR.
Ohmrathedar was one of roughly a dozen dragons who lived in hiding in Waterdeep. He was an ally of Taraunramorlamurla, a song dragon who acted as an intermediary between the dragons and human society. Ohmrathedar was known to fight on Taraunramorlamurlas behalf when necessary.
